newsitem.title: USA: PSINet sees 1996 revs below expectations.
newsitem.headline: PSINet sees 1996 revs below expectations.

text.p: PSINet Inc, an Internet service provider, said Monday it sees its 1996 revenues coming in lower than expected despite an increase in customers and associated revenues from corporate subscribers during the fourth quarter.

The company said it expected revenue to come in at the range of $22 million to $23.5 million. It said it expects earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization to be in the range of a loss of $0.24 per share to $0.21 per share.
Company executives said later Monday that earlier projections from analysts had revenues at between $27.5 million and $31 million.
((-- Lisa Marie Pane, New York newdesk, 212-859-1610))
